idea:
Munimji as the name suggests, is an idea that goes to the root of being an accountant.

We strive to provide solutions to everyday affairs of housing societies, co-op societies and hope to manage the same through a mobile app at your finger tips.

The access to the mobile application will enable every member of the society to have access to all the details of the management and working of the society without any extra effort. 

The mobile application will also help the member to access the society accounts, reports etc anytime, anywhere.
name: Munim Ji

name: BRIGHT IDEA BUSINESS SOLUTIONS LLP

idea:
I Ankit Gala (AG) take pride in to introducing myself as an astute and dedicated Tax & Accounts Consultant & Certified Financial Planner to provide one door Taxation, Auditing, Consulting, and Financial Planning and Investment Advisory solutions.

 

I have grown from strength to strength ever since I started my career in this field in 2004. I am a Practicing Tax & Accounts Consultant (Semi-Qualified Chartered Accountant from ICAI) and also a Certified financial planner (FPSB) & have also completed my post graduation in M Com from Mumbai University & Graduation in B.Com from Ritambhara College & having rich experience of more than 15 years in the field of taxation, auditing, consultancy & advisory services to clients to utilize their financial resources in best possible manner and enhance their quality of life. My experience encompasses the entire array of Direct & Indirect Taxation, Auditing, Corporate Laws, and International Taxation, Formation & Funding of Start-Ups & MSMEâ€™s, Investments Advisory, Portfolio Management Services & Financial Planning.

 

I have managed discretionary and non-discretionary accounts of many clients comprising business persons, salaried employees, professionals, HNIs. I have created significant value for my client base through prudent and disciplined consulting advisory and financial planning. My Clients are from various fields & services such as Manufacturers, Wholesale and Semi-Wholesale, Retailers in Food Grains & Pulses, Textile Industry, Chemical Products, Luxury Products, Architecture Products, Agricultural Products, Hotel Industry, Cakes, Printing, Painting, Fin-tech Companies, Ed-tech Companies and Lights & Luminaries & are located at Mumbai & various places in Maharashtra, Gujarat, Rajashthan, Indore, Bangalore, Kolkata, Hyderabad, Delhi & Dubai.
name: ANKIT GALA & ASSOCIATES
